ants.bot
Class AbstractSystemInputParser

java.lang.Object
  ants.bot.AbstractSystemInputReader
      ants.bot.AbstractSystemInputParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bot
public abstract class AbstractSystemInputParser
extends AbstractSystemInputReader

Handles system input stream parsing.

setup

public abstract void setup(int loadTime,
                           int turnTime,
                           int rows,
                           int cols,
                           int turns,
                           int viewRadius2,
                           int attackRadius2,
                           int spawnRadius2)
Sets up the game state.

Parameters:
loadTime - timeout for initializing and setting up the bot on turn 0
turnTime - timeout for a single game turn, starting with turn 1
rows - game map height
cols - game map width
turns - maximum number of turns the game will be played
viewRadius2 - squared view radius of each ant
attackRadius2 - squared attack radius of each ant
spawnRadius2 - squared spawn radius of each ant

beforeUpdate

public abstract void beforeUpdate()
Enables performing actions which should take place prior to updating the game state, like clearing old game data.
